department.dept_long_name: Division of Engineering and Applied Sciences

course.title: Software Engineering
course.description: Introduction to principles of software engineering and best practices, including code reviews, source control, and unit tests. Topics include Ajax, database schemas, event handling, HTTP, MVC, object-oriented design, and user experience. Projects include web apps with front-end UIs (mobile and desktop) and back-end APIs. Languages include JavaScript and PHP.
course.prerequisites: Any four CS courses numbered 50 or higher (or, with instructor's permission, multiple years of programming experience).
course.notes: Students will work on projects in groups. Enrollment may be limited. In 2014, this course will focus on the design and implementation of web apps.
